name: Ticketbox.vn shortcode
author: Josh Kopecek

sections.description:
Simply add [ticketbox id=”1234” height=”500” campaignid=”1234”]

To add the shortcode, you need * the ticketbox id * the height Optional * campaign id * width

You can get the tickebox event id from the url in ticketbox: http://ticketbox.vn/ticket-booking/1012/step1?Iframe=True&ac=3
sections.installation:
1. Upload the zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the ticketbox shortcode to your posts.

short_description: This plugin allows you to embed ticketbox.vn affiliate widget easily into a Wordpress post.
